title: MD
biography: Pavel Klener was a Czech oncologist and politician. A member of the Civic Forum and later the Civic Democratic Alliance, he served as Minister of Health and Social Affairs from 1989 to 1990 and was a member of the Czech National Council from 1990 to 1992.
aiSummary: Pavel Klener is a oncology specialist with an H-index of 31 at Charles University (Member). Has been published in International Journal of Molecular Sciences, Blood Cells Molecules and Diseases, International journal of molecular sciences. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
